title: SGPGIMS Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Student Internship Posts
description: The Sanjay Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Medical Sciences (SGPGI Lucknow) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Student Internship Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc., can apply for the SGPGIMS Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
